articles.title: Biden calls for tax on the wealthy to extend Medicare funding - CNBC
articles.description: President Joe Biden this week called for higher taxes on wealthy Americans to boost Medicare as part of his 2024 budget. Here's what to know about the plan.
articles.content:
President Joe Biden this week called for higher taxes on wealthy Americans to boost Medicare as part of his 2024 budget, aiming to help fund the program for at least 25 years.

articles.title: Major North American oil source yields clues to one of Earth's deadliest mass extinctions - Phys.org

articles.author: Bill Chappell
articles.title: Medical tourism in Mexico is rising among Americans - NPR
articles.description: Before the pandemic halted travel, some 1.2 million American citizens visited Mexico for health care. The number is rising quickly again, with border restrictions eased.
articles.content: A Red Cross worker closes the door of an ambulance carrying two Americans found alive after they were abducted in Matamoros, Mexico, last week. Two of four Americans have been found dead, after they … [+5205 chars]

articles.title: 2 Americans dead after kidnapping in Mexico; search for suspects continues - KITV
articles.description: Mexican authorities say at least one person has been arrested after 2 of the people were found dead.
